name: SnowFight 0.1.2
description:
WIP. Enjoy and if you like it, please comment and share. Thanks!

Keyboard 1: A-D for moving, Space for jump and Q for shot/skill.

Keyboard 2: Horizontal keys for moving, Up key for jump and Left control for shot/shill.

XBox360 Controller: Left axis for moving, A for jumping and RB for shot/skill.

More information
